Issue.creator: bstasyszyn
Issue.summary: Fabric selection service not waiting for responses from all peers on transient error
Issue.description: When a transient error is received from a discovery target then the client returns immediately, without waiting for responses from other targets. The transient error could be a result of a peer being behind in block height (e.g. peer has not yet received the chaincodeÂ instantiate block). Another peer may already be up to date and could return a successful response.
